AuthConfig.description: Authentication settings for secure access to storage.

AuthConfigUpdate.description: Authentication settings for secure access to storage.

Azure.ResourceManager.ResourceProvisioni.description: The provisioning state of a resource type.

values.name: Unknown
values.description: The backend connection is not initialized

values.name: Disconnected
values.description: The backend connection disconnected due to network error

values.name: AuthError
values.description: The backend connection disconnected due to auth error

BlobAccountConfig.description: a blob account used for mirroring

accountEndpoint.description: Blob storage endpoint, for example: https://mysa.core.windows.net

indexTagsMode.description: Mode MirrorIndexTags requires higher permissions. When set index tags will be translated to corresponding azindex.<name> xattrs. NoIndexTags will keep index tag xattrs unset.

BlobAccountConfigUpdate.description: a blob account used for mirroring

accountEndpoint.description: Blob storage endpoint, for example: https://mysa.core.windows.net

indexTagsMode.description: Mode MirrorIndexTags requires higher permissions. When set index tags will be translated to corresponding azindex.<name> xattrs. NoIndexTags will keep index tag xattrs unset.

BlobFilteringConfig.description: a scheme for filtering blobs to mirror

BlobFilteringConfigUpdate.description: a scheme for filtering blobs to mirror

values.name: InProgress
values.description: Good, just in progress creating the resources

values.name: Pending
values.description: Something is stuck waiting to be resolved, e.g. incorrect underlying storage configuration

values.name: Running
values.description: The configuration is running and in use

values.name: Unknown
values.description: We can't determine the status of the configuration

EdgeStorageConfiguration.description: EdgeStorageConfiguration is a custom resource that defines the configuration for edge storage settings.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

EdgeStorageConfigurationListResult.description: The response of a EdgeStorageConfiguration list operation.

value.description: The EdgeStorageConfiguration items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

EdgeStorageConfigurationProperties.description: Defines the properties of the EdgeStorageConfiguration resource.

defaultDiskStorageClasses.description: The default disk storage class(es) to be used for edge volumes. Must not be empty and is immutable once set.

workloadIdentity.description: Object containing optional workload identity information.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

status.description: Read only object to reflect changes that have occurred on the Edge. Similar to Kubernetes status property for custom resources.

EdgeStorageConfigurationPropertiesUpdate.description: Defines the properties of the EdgeStorageConfiguration resource.

workloadIdentity.description: Object containing optional workload identity information.

EdgeStorageConfigurationStatus.description: Defines the observed status of the EdgeStorageConfiguration resource.

state.description: The current state of the configuration.

details.description: Additional details about the configuration's status.

EdgeStorageConfigurationUpdate.description: EdgeStorageConfiguration is a custom resource that defines the configuration for edge storage settings.

value.description: The EdgeVolume items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

EdgeVolumeProperties.description: Defines the desired state (spec) of the EdgeVolume resource.

requestedSize.description: Size of the EdgeVolume (example: 1Gi). Must be a valid storage size and is immutable once set.

ingestOperationConcurrency.description: Weight of concurrency for ingest operations (between 1 and 256).

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

status.description: Read only object to reflect changes that have occurred on the Edge. Similar to Kubernetes status property for custom resources.

values.name: Unknown
values.description: edgevolume is in an unknown state

EdgeVolumeStatus.description: Defines the observed state (status) of the EdgeVolume resource.

state.description: The current state of the EdgeVolume. Defaults to 'unknown'.

details.description: Additional details about the EdgeVolume status.

spaceAvailable.description: The amount of space available (string format, e.g., '500Mi').

persistentVolume.description: The name of the kubernetes persistent volume resource underlying this edgevolume.

EdgeVolumeUpdate.description: EdgeVolume is a custom resource for defining an edge volume.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

EvictionOrder.description: Defines the possible order for clean file eviction.

values.name: unordered
values.description: Evict files in an unordered manner.

IngestOrder.description: Defines the possible order for dirty file ingestion.

values.name: oldest-first
values.description: Upload dirty files in the order of oldest first.

values.name: newest-first
values.description: Upload dirty files in the order of newest first.

IngestSubvolume.description: IngestSubvolume is a custom resource that defines the configuration for a subvolume.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

IngestSubvolumeEvictionConfig.description: The eviction configuration for the subvolume.

order.description: The order in which clean files will be evicted - this is best effort, not a guarantee.

minDelaySec.description: The minimum number of seconds before a clean file is eligible for eviction.

IngestSubvolumeIngestConfig.description: The ingest configuration for the subvolume.

order.description: The order in which dirty files will be uploaded - this is best effort, not a guarantee.

minDelaySec.description: The minimum number of seconds before a dirty file is eligible for ingest.
